name: Reversed Assimilation
description:
Controls
  • LMB / hold LMB to move
  • 1 / 2  to change state
  • RMB to use ability
  • R to restart
Features
  • 🚶‍♂️ Explore 2 biomes (originally planned for 3, but run out of time...)
  • 🔬 Assimilate earthy items and change state
  • 📥 Find the missing engine piece and return to your ship
Bugs
  • Can get to a state where not enough lemons are found
  • Sometimes the area / location message gets triggered by RMB
  • Can walk over a rock, exposing the red power (attack mesh)
  • Noticed the blinking text warning was not blinking (so not showing, so moved it to a normal non-blinking text)
  • And many more!

Music by Jonny Easton.

Made for Metroidvania Month 19 in 2 days.
